dcterms:creator: M. Xu
C. Li
S. Zhang
P. L. Callet
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 540 impaired 360° videos from 60 reference 360° videos under equirectangular projection (ERP). The resolution of all videos covers from 4K (3840×1920 pixels) to 8K (7680×3840 pixels). For each reference, 9 types of impairment are applied, including three compression levels and three projection patterns. Each 360° video is rated by 20-30 subjects, with subjective quality scores ranging from 0 to 100.
dcterms:title: VQA-ODV

dcterms:creator: B. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 16 reference 360° videos at a resolution of 4096×2048 and a frame rate of 30 frames per second. The format of the 360° reference videos is YUV420p at a bit-rate of 100 Mbps. By imposing 24 types of distortion on the reference, there are 384 impaired 360° videos produced, with subjective quality scores rated by 23 subjects, ranging from 0 to 100.
dcterms:title: BIT360
